message.content: Implement the following plan: # Plan: DealFlow — Pixel Art Pastel Landing Page Redesign ## Context A/B/C testing phase is complete. Team chose **Version B** with messaging reframed for creators: "Built for creators, not accountants." Now doing a full visual redesign — from dark glassmorphism to a **light pastel pixel art / isometric voxel** style inspired by Minecraft but in soft tones. Light theme is default, dark mode available via toggle. **Live URL**: https://baranskyi.github.io/influencer-platform/ **Repo**: github.com/baranskyi/influencer-platform --- ## Design System ### Typography - **Headlines**: `DM Serif Display` — wide, elegant serif with personality. Girly-creative feel without being childish. - **Body**: `Inter` — clean, readable sans-serif (already in use) - **Pixel accents** (badges, labels): `Press Start 2P` — used sparingly for pixel-art flavor on small UI elements only - Google Fonts: `DM Serif Display:wght@400` + `Inter:wght@300..800` + `Press Start 2P` ### Color Palette (Light Default) | Token | Light | Dark | Usage | |-------|-------|------|-------| | `--bg` | `#FFF5F7` (rose white) | `#1A1118` | Page background | | `--surface` | `rgba(255,255,255,0.7)` | `rgba(30,20,28,0.7)` | Glass cards | | `--surface-solid` | `#FFFFFF` | `#241C22` | Solid cards | | `--accent` | `#E8788A` (soft rose) | `#E8788A` | Primary accent (buttons, links) | | `--accent-hover` | `#D4556A` | `#F09DAA` | Hover state | | `--mint` | `#7ECFB3` | `#7ECFB3` | Status: done/delivered | | `--lavender` | `#B8A9E8` | `#B8A9E8` | Status: in progress | | `--peach` | `#FFB088` | `#FFB088` | Status: waiting | | `--sky` | `#8AC4F4` | `#8AC4F4` | Status: upcoming | | `--text-primary` | `#2D1F2D` | `#F5EEF2` | Headlines, body | | `--text-secondary` | `#7A6B7A` | `#A89BA6` | Muted text | | `--border` | `rgba(0,0,0,0.06)` | `rgba(255,255,255,0.08)` | Borders | ### Glassmorphism (Light-adapted) - `glass`: `bg: rgba(255,255,255,0.55)`, `backdrop-filter: blur(20px)`, `border: 1px solid rgba(0,0,0,0.06)`, `box-shadow: 0 4px 24px rgba(45,31,45,0.06)` - `glass-elevated`: stronger blur (28px), subtle rose glow shadow - Dark mode: swap to dark rgba values, white border alphas ### Pixel Art Integration - Decorative pixel-art characters as `` tags (generated via Gemini, placed as PNGs) - Pixel-style decorative elements via CSS `box-shadow` pixel patterns (corner decorations) - `image-rendering: pixelated` on character images to maintain crispness - Small pixel-art dotted borders on some cards --- ## Messaging (Final — Hook 2, no Gmail) - **Badge** (Press Start 2P, 10px): "The business side of being a creator, handled" - **Headline** (DM Serif Display, ~56px): "Built for **creators,** not accountants." - **Subhead** (Inter, 18px): "Brands love your content. But the invoices, follow-ups, and payment tracking? Not exactly your vibe. DealFlow organizes every brand deal and nudges you only when it matters — so you stay in your flow." - **CTA Primary**: "Get early access" (rose accent, rounded-xl) - **CTA Secondary**: "See how it works" (ghost button, scrolls to #how-it-works) - **Trust**: "Built by creators, for creators." --- ## Page Structure ### 1. Navbar (fixed, glass) - DealFlow logo + name - Theme toggle (sun/moon icon) - "Get early access" CTA button ### 2. Hero Section - **Left**: Badge → H1 → Subhead → CTA buttons → Trust line - **Right**: Glass card "Your brand deals, organized" - 4 rows: FashionCo "Content delivered" (mint), TechBrand "Waiting for payment" (peach), SnackBox "Briefing received" (lavender), FitGear "Shooting next week" (sky) - Footer: "Always up to date — DealFlow handles the tracking" - NO dollar amounts, NO stats - **Pixel art character**: placeholder `` for creator filming with phone (positioned floating near the card) ### 3. Problem Section - Header: "Sound familiar?" (DM Serif Display) - 3 glass cards: - "68%" — "of creators say admin kills their creative flow" - "1 in 3" — "brand deals has payment issues creators never follow up on" - "5+" — "brand conversations the average creator juggles at once" - Pixel art character: placeholder for creator with dog ### 4. Features Section - Header: "What DealFlow does" - 2 glass cards: - "Brands pay you on time — automatically" + description - "Every brand deal, one calm dashboard" + description - Pixel art character: placeholder for creator holding product ### 5. How It Works (#how-it-works) - 3 steps with pixel-style number badges: 1. "Sign up in 2 minutes" 2. "We organize your brand deals" 3. "You create, we handle the rest" ### 6. Waitlist Form (#waitlist) - Glass-elevated card with rose glow - Email input + role select + submit button - Formspree action: `https://formspree.io/f/xpwzgkvl` - Success state with checkmark ### 7. Footer - DealFlow logo + copyright --- ## Pixel Art Images (3 placeholders) Generate via `nano-banana-pro` skill after landing page is built: 1. **Hero**: Isometric pixel-art creator filming selfie with phone, pastel colors, Minecraft voxel style, pink/mint/lavender tones, white background 2. **Problem section**: Isometric pixel-art creator sitting with cute dog, laptop nearby, pastel voxel style 3. **Features section**: Isometric pixel-art creator holding product/unboxing, pastel voxel style Images saved to `Projects/influencer-platform/img/` and referenced in HTML. --- ## Files to Modify - `Projects/influencer-platform/landing-page.html` — full rewrite ## Deployment - Push to `github.com/baranskyi/influencer-platform` (as `index.html` + `img/` folder) - GitHub Pages already enabled ## Verification - [ ] Light theme is default, dark mode via toggle - [ ] DM Serif Display renders for headlines - [ ] Pixel art character placeholders visible - [ ] No A/B/C tabs — single version - [ ] No dollar amounts or stats in hero card - [ ] Formspree waitlist submits correctly - [ ] Responsive: 375px, 768px, 1440px - [ ] `prefers-reduced-motion` respected - [ ] All clickable elements have `cursor-pointer` - [ ] Text contrast ≥ 4.5:1 in both themes If you need specific details from before exiting plan mode (like exact code snippets, error messages, or content you generated), read the full transcript at: /Users/slavabaranskyi/.REDACTED.jsonl

content.text: Хорошо, я вижу текущий файл с A/B/C тестированием. Теперь создам полный редизайн. Сначала создам директорию для изображений и напишу новый HTML.

content.text: Теперь пишу полный новый landing page.

input.content:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en" data-theme="light">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>DealFlow — Built for creators, not accountants</title>
    <meta name="description" content="DealFlow organizes every brand deal and nudges you only when it matters — so you stay in your flow.">
    <link rel="preconnect" href="https://fonts.googleapis.com">
    <link rel="preconnect" href="https://fonts.gstatic.com" crossorigin>
    <link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=DM+Serif+Display&family=Inter:wght@300..800&family=Press+Start+2P&display=swap" rel="stylesheet">
    <style>
        /* ===== Reset ===== */
        *, *::before, *::after { margin: 0; padding: 0; box-sizing: border-box; }

        /* ===== CSS Custom Properties ===== */
        :root {
            --font-headline: 'DM Serif Display', Georgia, serif;
            --font-body: 'Inter', system-ui, sans-serif;
            --font-pixel: 'Press Start 2P', monospace;

            /* Light theme (default) */
            --bg: #FFF5F7;
            --surface: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.7);
            --surface-solid: #FFFFFF;
            --accent: #E8788A;
            --accent-hover: #D4556A;
            --accent-rgb: 232, 120, 138;
            --mint: #7ECFB3;
            --lavender: #B8A9E8;
            --peach: #FFB088;
            --sky: #8AC4F4;
            --text-primary: #2D1F2D;
            --text-secondary: #7A6B7A;
            --border: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.06);
            --glass-bg: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.55);
            --glass-blur: 20px;
            --glass-border: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.06);
            --glass-shadow: 0 4px 24px rgba(45, 31, 45, 0.06);
            --glass-elevated-blur: 28px;
            --glass-elevated-shadow: 0 8px 40px rgba(45, 31, 45, 0.08), 0 0 60px rgba(232, 120, 138, 0.06);
            --nav-bg: rgba(255, 245, 247, 0.7);
            --input-bg: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8);
            --pixel-dot: #E8788A;
        }

        [data-theme="dark"] {
            --bg: #1A1118;
            --surface: rgba(30, 20, 28, 0.7);
            --surface-solid: #241C22;
            --accent: #E8788A;
            --accent-hover: #F09DAA;
            --accent-rgb: 232, 120, 138;
            --text-primary: #F5EEF2;
            --text-secondary: #A89BA6;
            --border: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.08);
            --glass-bg: rgba(30, 20, 28, 0.55);
            --glass-border: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.08);
            --glass-shadow: 0 4px 24px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
            --glass-elevated-shadow: 0 8px 40px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3), 0 0 60px rgba(232, 120, 138, 0.08);
            --nav-bg: rgba(26, 17, 24, 0.75);
            --input-bg: rgba(36, 28, 34, 0.8);
        }

        /* ===== Base ===== */
        body {
            font-family: var(--font-body);
            background: var(--bg);
            color: var(--text-primary);
            line-height: 1.6;
            transition: background 0.35s ease, color 0.35s ease;
            overflow-x: hidden;
        }

        h1, h2, h3 { font-family: var(--font-headline); font-weight: 400; }

        a { text-decoration: none; color: inherit; }

        img { max-width: 100%; height: auto; }

        /* ===== Glassmorphism ===== */
        .glass {
            background: var(--glass-bg);
            backdrop-filter: blur(var(--glass-blur));
            -webkit-backdrop-filter: blur(var(--glass-blur));
            border: 1px solid var(--glass-border);
            box-shadow: var(--glass-shadow);
        }

        .glass-elevated {
            background: var(--glass-bg);
            backdrop-filter: blur(var(--glass-elevated-blur));
            -webkit-backdrop-filter: blur(var(--glass-elevated-blur));
            border: 1px solid var(--glass-border);
            box-shadow: var(--glass-elevated-shadow);
        }

        /* ===== Buttons ===== */
        .btn-primary {
            display: inline-flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            gap: 0.5rem;
            padding: 1rem 2rem;
            background: var(--accent);
            color: #fff;
            font-family: var(--font-body);
            font-weight: 600;
            font-size: 1rem;
            border: none;
            border-radius: 1rem;
            cursor: pointer;
            transition: all 0.2s ease;
        }
        .btn-primary:hover {
            background: var(--accent-hover);
            transform: translateY(-1px);
            box-shadow: 0 8px 30px rgba(var(--accent-rgb), 0.3);
        }

        .btn-ghost {
            display: inline-flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            gap: 0.5rem;
            padding: 1rem 2rem;
            background: transparent;
            color: var(--accent);
            font-family: var(--font-body);
            font-weight: 600;
            font-size: 1rem;
            border: 2px solid var(--accent);
            border-radius: 1rem;
            cursor: pointer;
            transition: all 0.2s ease;
        }
        .btn-ghost:hover {
            background: rgba(var(--accent-rgb), 0.08);
            transform: translateY(-1px);
        }

        /* ===== Navbar ===== */
        .navbar {
            position: fixed;
            top: 0;
            left: 0;
            right: 0;
            z-index: 100;
            background: var(--nav-bg);
            backdrop-filter: blur(20px);
            -webkit-backdrop-filter: blur(20px);
            border-bottom: 1px solid var(--glass-border);
            padding: 0.875rem 1.5rem;
        }
        .navbar-inner {
            max-width: 1200px;
            margin: 0 auto;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: space-between;
        }
        .logo {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 0.625rem;
        }
        .logo-icon {
            width: 36px;
            height: 36px;
            background: var(--accent);
            border-radius: 10px;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
        }
        .logo-name {
            font-family: var(--font-headline);
            font-size: 1.375rem;
            color: var(--text-primary);
        }
        .navbar-actions {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 1rem;
        }
        .nav-cta {
            padding: 0.625rem 1.25rem;
            background: var(--accent);
            color: #fff;
            font-weight: 600;
            font-size: 0.875rem;
            border-radius: 0.75rem;
            border: none;
            cursor: pointer;
            transition: all 0.2s;
        }
        .nav-cta:hover { background: var(--accent-hover); }

        /* Theme toggle */
        .theme-toggle {
            width: 44px;
            height: 26px;
            border-radius: 13px;
            background: rgba(var(--accent-rgb), 0.15);
            border: 1px solid rgba(var(--accent-rgb), 0.25);
            position: relative;
            cursor: pointer;
            transition: background 0.3s;
            flex-shrink: 0;
        }
        .theme-toggle::after {
            content: '';
            position: absolute;
            width: 20px;
            height: 20px;
            border-radius: 50%;
            background: var(--accent);
            top: 2px;
            left: 2px;
            transition: transform 0.3s;
            box-shadow: 0 1px 4px rgba(0,0,0,0.15);
        }
        [data-theme="dark"] .theme-toggle::after {
            transform: translateX(18px);
        }
        .theme-icon {
            position: absolute;
            top: 50%;
            transform: translateY(-50%);
            font-size: 12px;
            line-height: 1;
            pointer-events: none;
        }
        .theme-icon--sun { left: 5px; }
        .theme-icon--moon { right: 5px; }
        [data-theme="light"] .theme-icon--moon { opacity: 0.3; }
        [data-theme="dark"] .theme-icon--sun { opacity: 0.3; }

        /* ===== Hero ===== */
        .hero {
            padding: 8rem 1.5rem 4rem;
            max-width: 1200px;
            margin: 0 auto;
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr;
            gap: 4rem;
            align-items: center;
            min-height: 90vh;
            position: relative;
        }
        .hero-left { position: relative; z-index: 2; }
        .hero-right { position: relative; z-index: 2; }

        .hero-badge {
            display: inline-block;
            font-family: var(--font-pixel);
            font-size: 9px;
            color: var(--accent);
            background: rgba(var(--accent-rgb), 0.1);
            border: 1px solid rgba(var(--accent-rgb), 0.2);
            padding: 0.5rem 1rem;
            border-radius: 0.5rem;
            margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
            line-height: 1.6;
        }

        .hero h1 {
            font-size: clamp(2.5rem, 5vw, 3.5rem);
            line-height: 1.15;
            margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
            color: var(--text-primary);
        }
        .hero h1 em {
            color: var(--accent);
            font-style: normal;
        }

        .hero-subhead {
            font-size: 1.125rem;
            color: var(--text-secondary);
            line-height: 1.7;
            margin-bottom: 2rem;
            max-width: 520px;
        }

        .hero-ctas {
            display: flex;
            gap: 1rem;
            flex-wrap: wrap;
            margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
        }

        .hero-trust {
            font-size: 0.875rem;
            color: var(--text-secondary);
        }

        /* Hero card */
        .hero-card {
            border-radius: 1.25rem;
            padding: 1.75rem;
            position: relative;
        }
        .hero-card-title {
            font-family: var(--font-body);
            font-size: 0.75rem;
            font-weight: 600;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            letter-spacing: 0.08em;
            color: var(--text-secondary);
            margin-bottom: 1.25rem;
        }
        .deal-row {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: space-between;
            padding: 0.875rem 1rem;
            background: var(--surface);
            border: 1px solid var(--glass-border);
            border-radius: 0.75rem;
            margin-bottom: 0.625rem;
        }
        .deal-row:last-child { margin-bottom: 0; }
        .deal-left {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 0.75rem;
        }
        .deal-avatar {
            width: 36px;
            height: 36px;
            border-radius: 0.625rem;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            font-size: 0.75rem;
            font-weight: 700;
            color: #fff;
        }
        .deal-info-name {
            font-size: 0.9rem;
            font-weight: 600;
            color: var(--text-primary);
        }
        .deal-status {
            font-family: var(--font-pixel);
            font-size: 7px;
            padding: 0.375rem 0.75rem;
            border-radius: 0.375rem;
            line-height: 1;
        }
        .status-mint { background: rgba(126, 207, 179, 0.15); color: var(--mint); }
        .status-peach { background: rgba(255, 176, 136, 0.15); color: var(--peach); }
        .status-lavender { background: rgba(184, 169, 232, 0.15); color: var(--lavender); }
        .status-sky { background: rgba(138, 196, 244, 0.15); color: var(--sky); }
        .hero-card-footer {
            margin-top: 1.25rem;
            padding-top: 1rem;
            border-top: 1px solid var(--glass-border);
            font-size: 0.8rem;
            color: var(--text-secondary);
            text-align: center;
        }

        /* Pixel art character placeholder */
        .pixel-character {
            position: absolute;
            image-rendering: pixelated;
            pointer-events: none;
            z-index: 3;
        }
        .pixel-character img {
            image-rendering: pixelated;
            width: 100%;
            height: auto;
        }
        .hero .pixel-character {
            width: 140px;
            bottom: -30px;
            right: -40px;
        }

        /* Decorative orbs */
        .orb {
            position: absolute;
            border-radius: 50%;
            filter: blur(80px);
            opacity: 0.25;
            pointer-events: none;
            z-index: 0;
        }
        [data-theme="dark"] .orb { opacity: 0.12; }

        /* ===== Problem Section ===== */
        .section-problem {
            padding: 5rem 1.5rem;
            max-width: 1200px;
            margin: 0 auto;
            position: relative;
        }
        .section-header {
            text-align: center;
            margin-bottom: 3rem;
        }
        .section-header h2 {
            font-size: clamp(2rem, 4vw, 2.75rem);
            color: var(--text-primary);
            margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
        }
        .section-header p {
            color: var(--text-secondary);
            font-size: 1.125rem;
        }

        .problem-grid {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(3, 1fr);
            gap: 1.5rem;
            position: relative;
            z-index: 2;
        }
        .problem-card {
            border-radius: 1.25rem;
            padding: 2rem;
            text-align: center;
            transition: transform 0.2s ease;
        }
        .problem-card:hover { transform: translateY(-4px); }
        .problem-stat {
            font-family: var(--font-headline);
            font-size: 3rem;
            color: var(--accent);
            margin-bottom: 0.75rem;
        }
        .problem-text {
            font-size: 0.95rem;
            color: var(--text-secondary);
            line-height: 1.6;
        }

        /* ===== Features Section ===== */
        .section-features {
            padding: 5rem 1.5rem;
            max-width: 1200px;
            margin: 0 auto;
            position: relative;
        }
        .features-grid {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr);
            gap: 1.5rem;
            position: relative;
            z-index: 2;
        }
        .feature-card {
            border-radius: 1.25rem;
            padding: 2.5rem;
            transition: transform 0.2s ease;
        }
        .feature-card:hover { transform: translateY(-4px); }
        .feature-icon {
            width: 56px;
            height: 56px;
            border-radius: 1rem;
            background: rgba(var(--accent-rgb), 0.1);
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            margin-bottom: 1.25rem;
        }
        .feature-card h3 {
            font-size: 1.375rem;
            margin-bottom: 0.75rem;
            color: var(--text-primary);
        }
        .feature-card p {
            font-size: 1rem;
            color: var(--text-secondary);
            line-height: 1.7;
        }

        /* ===== How It Works ===== */
        .section-how {
            padding: 5rem 1.5rem;
            max-width: 1200px;
            margin: 0 auto;
        }
        .steps-grid {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(3, 1fr);
            gap: 2rem;
        }
        .step {
            text-align: center;
        }
        .step-number {
            width: 56px;
            height: 56px;
            margin: 0 auto 1.25rem;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            border-radius: 1rem;
            font-family: var(--font-pixel);
            font-size: 16px;
            color: var(--accent);
            background: rgba(var(--accent-rgb), 0.1);
            border: 2px solid rgba(var(--accent-rgb), 0.2);
            /* pixel dotted border effect */
            box-shadow:
                -2px -2px 0 0 rgba(var(--accent-rgb), 0.15),
                2px -2px 0 0 rgba(var(--accent-rgb), 0.15),
                -2px 2px 0 0 rgba(var(--accent-rgb), 0.15),
                2px 2px 0 0 rgba(var(--accent-rgb), 0.15);
        }
        .step h3 {
            font-size: 1.25rem;
            margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
            color: var(--text-primary);
        }
        .step p {
            font-size: 0.95rem;
            color: var(--text-secondary);
            line-height: 1.6;
        }

        /* ===== Waitlist Section ===== */
        .section-waitlist {
            padding: 5rem 1.5rem;
            max-width: 600px;
            margin: 0 auto;
            position: relative;
        }
        .waitlist-card {
            border-radius: 1.5rem;
            padding: 3rem;
            text-align: center;
            position: relative;
            z-index: 2;
        }
        .waitlist-card h2 {
            font-size: 2.25rem;
            margin-bottom: 0.75rem;
            color: var(--text-primary);
        }
        .waitlist-card .subtitle {
            color: var(--text-secondary);
            font-size: 1rem;
            margin-bottom: 2rem;
        }
        .waitlist-form { display: flex; flex-direction: column; gap: 1rem; }
        .waitlist-input {
            width: 100%;
            padding: 1rem 1.25rem;
            border-radius: 0.875rem;
            border: 1px solid var(--glass-border);
            background: var(--input-bg);
            color: var(--text-primary);
            font-family: var(--font-body);
            font-size: 1rem;
            outline: none;
            transition: border-color 0.2s, box-shadow 0.2s;
        }
        .waitlist-input::placeholder { color: var(--text-secondary); opacity: 0.6; }
        .waitlist-input:focus {
            border-color: var(--accent);
            box-shadow: 0 0 0 3px rgba(var(--accent-rgb), 0.12);
        }
        .waitlist-select {
            width: 100%;
            padding: 1rem 1.25rem;
            border-radius: 0.875rem;
            border: 1px solid var(--glass-border);
            background: var(--input-bg);
            color: var(--text-primary);
            font-family: var(--font-body);
            font-size: 1rem;
            outline: none;
            appearance: none;
            cursor: pointer;
            transition: border-color 0.2s, box-shadow 0.2s;
        }
        .waitlist-select:focus {
            border-color: var(--accent);
            box-shadow: 0 0 0 3px rgba(var(--accent-rgb), 0.12);
        }
        .waitlist-submit {
            width: 100%;
            padding: 1rem;
            font-size: 1.125rem;
        }
        .waitlist-note {
            font-size: 0.8rem;
            color: var(--text-secondary);
            margin-top: 0.5rem;
        }
        .waitlist-success {
            display: none;
            padding: 2rem 0;
        }
        .waitlist-success.visible { display: block; }
        .success-check {
            width: 64px;
            height: 64px;
            border-radius: 50%;
            background: rgba(var(--accent-rgb), 0.1);
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            margin: 0 auto 1rem;
        }
        .success-check svg { color: var(--accent); }

        /* ===== Footer ===== */
        .footer {
            padding: 2rem 1.5rem;
            border-top: 1px solid var(--glass-border);
            text-align: center;
        }
        .footer-inner {
            max-width: 1200px;
            margin: 0 auto;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: space-between;
        }
        .footer-copy {
            font-size: 0.8rem;
            color: var(--text-secondary);
        }

        /* ===== Pixel Corner Decorations ===== */
        .pixel-corner {
            position: absolute;
            width: 24px;
            height: 24px;
            opacity: 0.3;
            pointer-events: none;
        }
        .pixel-corner--tl { top: 8px; left: 8px; }
        .pixel-corner--tr { top: 8px; right: 8px; transform: scaleX(-1); }
        .pixel-corner--bl { bottom: 8px; left: 8px; transform: scaleY(-1); }
        .pixel-corner--br { bottom: 8px; right: 8px; transform: scale(-1); }
        .pixel-corner svg { width: 100%; height: 100%; }

        /* ===== Reduced Motion ===== */
        @media (prefers-reduced-motion: reduce) {
            *, *::before, *::after {
                animation-duration: 0.01ms !important;
                transition-duration: 0.01ms !important;
            }
        }

        /* ===== Responsive ===== */
        @media (max-width: 1024px) {
            .hero {
                grid-template-columns: 1fr;
                gap: 3rem;
                padding-top: 7rem;
                min-height: auto;
            }
            .hero-right { order: -1; }
            .hero .pixel-character { display: none; }
            .features-grid { grid-template-columns: 1fr; }
        }

        @media (max-width: 768px) {
            .problem-grid { grid-template-columns: 1fr; }
            .steps-grid { grid-template-columns: 1fr; gap: 2.5rem; }
            .hero h1 { font-size: 2.25rem; }
            .hero-badge { font-size: 8px; }
            .waitlist-card { padding: 2rem 1.5rem; }
            .footer-inner { flex-direction: column; gap: 0.75rem; }
            .nav-cta-desktop { display: none; }
        }

        @media (max-width: 375px) {
            .hero { padding-top: 6rem; padding-left: 1rem; padding-right: 1rem; }
            .hero-ctas { flex-direction: column; }
            .section-problem,
            .section-features,
            .section-how,
            .section-waitlist { padding-left: 1rem; padding-right: 1rem; }
        }
    </style>
</head>
<body>

    <!-- ========== Navbar ========== -->
    <nav class="navbar">
        <div class="navbar-inner">
            <div class="logo">
                <div class="logo-icon">
                    <svg width="20" height="20" fill="none" stroke="#fff" viewBox="0 0 24 24" stroke-width="2.5">
                        <path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" d="M13 7h8m0 0v8m0-8l-8 8-4-4-6 6"/>
                    </svg>
                </div>
                <span class="logo-name">DealFlow</span>
            </div>
            <div class="navbar-actions">
                <div class="theme-toggle" onclick="toggleTheme()" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-label="Toggle light/dark theme">
                    <span class="theme-icon theme-icon--sun">☀️</span>
                    <span class="theme-icon theme-icon--moon">🌙</span>
                </div>
                <a href="#waitlist" class="nav-cta nav-cta-desktop">Get early access</a>
            </div>
        </div>
    </nav>

    <main>

        <!-- ========== Hero ========== -->
        <section class="hero">
            <!-- Decorative orbs -->
            <div class="orb" style="width: 400px; height: 400px; top: -80px; left: -100px; background: rgba(232,120,138,0.35);"></div>
            <div class="orb" style="width: 300px; height: 300px; bottom: -60px; right: -60px; background: rgba(184,169,232,0.3);"></div>

            <div class="hero-left">
                <div class="hero-badge">The business side of being a creator, handled</div>
                <h1>Built for <em>creators,</em> not accountants.</h1>
                <p class="hero-subhead">
                    Brands love your content. But the invoices, follow-ups, and payment tracking? Not exactly your vibe.
                    DealFlow organizes every brand deal and nudges you only when it matters — so you stay in your flow.
                </p>
                <div class="hero-ctas">
                    <a href="#waitlist" class="btn-primary">Get early access</a>
                    <a href="#how-it-works" class="btn-ghost">See how it works</a>
                </div>
                <p class="hero-trust">Built by creators, for creators.</p>
            </div>

            <div class="hero-right">
                <div class="hero-card glass-elevated" style="position: relative;">
                    <!-- Pixel corner decorations -->
                    <div class="pixel-corner pixel-corner--tl">
                        <svg viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="var(--accent)" opacity="0.4">
                            <rect x="0" y="0" width="4" height="4"/><rect x="4" y="0" width="4" height="4"/><rect x="8" y="0" width="4" height="4"/>
                            <rect x="0" y="4" width="4" height="4"/><rect x="0" y="8" width="4" height="4"/>
                        </svg>
                    </div>
                    <div class="pixel-corner pixel-corner--br">
                        <svg viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="var(--accent)" opacity="0.4">
                            <rect x="0" y="0" width="4" height="4"/><rect x="4" y="0" width="4" height="4"/><rect x="8" y="0" width="4" height="4"/>
                            <rect x="0" y="4" width="4" height="4"/><rect x="0" y="8" width="4" height="4"/>
                        </svg>
                    </div>

                    <p class="hero-card-title">Your brand deals, organized</p>

                    <div class="deal-row">
                        <div class="deal-left">
                            <div class="deal-avatar" style="background: var(--mint);">FC</div>
                            <span class="deal-info-name">FashionCo</span>
                        </div>
                        <span class="deal-status status-mint">Content delivered</span>
                    </div>
                    <div class="deal-row">
                        <div class="deal-left">
                            <div class="deal-avatar" style="background: var(--peach);">TB</div>
                            <span class="deal-info-name">TechBrand</span>
                        </div>
                        <span class="deal-status status-peach">Waiting for payment</span>
                    </div>
                    <div class="deal-row">
                        <div class="deal-left">
                            <div class="deal-avatar" style="background: var(--lavender);">SB</div>
                            <span class="deal-info-name">SnackBox</span>
                        </div>
                        <span class="deal-status status-lavender">Briefing received</span>
                    </div>
                    <div class="deal-row">
                        <div class="deal-left">
                            <div class="deal-avatar" style="background: var(--sky);">FG</div>
                            <span class="deal-info-name">FitGear</span>
                        </div>
                        <span class="deal-status status-sky">Shooting next week</span>
                    </div>

                    <p class="hero-card-footer">Always up to date — DealFlow handles the tracking</p>

                    <!-- Pixel art character placeholder: creator filming -->
                    <div class="pixel-character" style="width: 120px; bottom: -30px; right: -50px;">
                        <img src="img/hero-creator.png" alt="Pixel art creator filming with phone" width="120" height="120"
                             onerror="this.parentElement.innerHTML='<svg viewBox="0 0 64 64" width="120" height="120" style="image-rendering:pixelated"><rect x="24" y="8" width="16" height="16" fill="#E8788A" rx="2"/><rect x="20" y="24" width="24" height="20" fill="#B8A9E8" rx="2"/><rect x="44" y="26" width="12" height="8" fill="#7A6B7A" rx="1"/><rect x="24" y="44" width="8" height="14" fill="#FFB088" rx="1"/><rect x="32" y="44" width="8" height="14" fill="#FFB088" rx="1"/></svg>'">
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </section>

        <!-- ========== Problem Section ========== -->
        <section class="section-problem">
            <div class="orb" style="width: 350px; height: 350px; bottom: -100px; right: -80px; background: rgba(126,207,179,0.25);"></div>

            <div class="section-header">
                <h2>Sound familiar?</h2>
            </div>

            <div class="problem-grid">
                <div class="problem-card glass">
                    <div class="problem-stat">68%</div>
                    <p class="problem-text">of creators say admin kills their creative flow</p>
                </div>
                <div class="problem-card glass">
                    <div class="problem-stat">1 in 3</div>
                    <p class="problem-text">brand deals has payment issues creators never follow up on</p>
                </div>
                <div class="problem-card glass">
                    <div class="problem-stat">5+</div>
                    <p class="problem-text">brand conversations the average creator juggles at once</p>
                </div>
            </div>

            <!-- Pixel art character placeholder: creator with dog -->
            <div style="position: absolute; bottom: -20px; left: 40px; z-index: 3; width: 100px; image-rendering: pixelated; pointer-events: none;">
                <img src="img/problem-creator.png" alt="Pixel art creator with dog" width="100" height="100" style="image-rendering: pixelated;"
                     onerror="this.parentElement.innerHTML='<svg viewBox="0 0 64 64" width="100" height="100" style="image-rendering:pixelated"><rect x="16" y="12" width="14" height="14" fill="#E8788A" rx="2"/><rect x="12" y="26" width="22" height="18" fill="#8AC4F4" rx="2"/><rect x="16" y="44" width="6" height="12" fill="#FFB088"/><rect x="24" y="44" width="6" height="12" fill="#FFB088"/><rect x="40" y="32" width="14" height="10" fill="#FFB088" rx="3"/><rect x="42" y="28" width="6" height="6" fill="#FFB088" rx="2"/><rect x="48" y="42" width="4" height="4" fill="#D4A574"/><rect x="52" y="36" width="3" height="6" fill="#FFB088" rx="1"/></svg>'">
            </div>
        </section>

        <!-- ========== Features Section ========== -->
        <section class="section-features">
            <div class="section-header">
                <h2>What DealFlow does</h2>
            </div>

            <div class="features-grid">
                <div class="feature-card glass">
                    <div class="feature-icon">
                        <svg width="28" height="28" fill="none" stroke="var(--accent)" viewBox="0 0 24 24" stroke-width="1.5">
                            <path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" d="M12 6v6h4.5m4.5 0a9 9 0 1 1-18 0 9 9 0 0 1 18 0Z"/>
                        </svg>
                    </div>
                    <h3>Brands pay you on time — automatically</h3>
                    <p>DealFlow tracks every payment deadline and sends gentle nudges to brands before invoices go overdue. No more awkward follow-up emails — we handle the reminders, you keep creating.</p>
                </div>
                <div class="feature-card glass" style="position: relative;">
                    <div class="feature-icon">
                        <svg width="28" height="28" fill="none" stroke="var(--accent)" viewBox="0 0 24 24" stroke-width="1.5">
                            <path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" d="M3.75 6A2.25 2.25 0 0 1 6 3.75h2.25A2.25 2.25 0 0 1 10.5 6v2.25a2.25 2.25 0 0 1-2.25 2.25H6a2.25 2.25 0 0 1-2.25-2.25V6ZM3.75 15.75A2.25 2.25 0 0 1 6 13.5h2.25a2.25 2.25 0 0 1 2.25 2.25V18a2.25 2.25 0 0 1-2.25 2.25H6A2.25 2.25 0 0 1 3.75 18v-2.25ZM13.5 6a2.25 2.25 0 0 1 2.25-2.25H18A2.25 2.25 0 0 1 20.25 6v2.25A2.25 2.25 0 0 1 18 10.5h-2.25a2.25 2.25 0 0 1-2.25-2.25V6ZM13.5 15.75a2.25 2.25 0 0 1 2.25-2.25H18a2.25 2.25 0 0 1 2.25 2.25V18A2.25 2.25 0 0 1 18 20.25h-2.25a2.25 2.25 0 0 1-2.25-2.25v-2.25Z"/>
                        </svg>
                    </div>
                    <h3>Every brand deal, one calm dashboard</h3>
                    <p>See what's negotiated, what's in progress, and what's been delivered — all in one clean view. Replace messy spreadsheets and endless email threads with a dashboard that just makes sense.</p>

                    <!-- Pixel art character placeholder: creator with product -->
                    <div style="position: absolute; bottom: -25px; right: -30px; width: 100px; image-rendering: pixelated; pointer-events: none;">
                        <img src="img/features-creator.png" alt="Pixel art creator holding product" width="100" height="100" style="image-rendering: pixelated;"
                             onerror="this.parentElement.innerHTML='<svg viewBox="0 0 64 64" width="100" height="100" style="image-rendering:pixelated"><rect x="22" y="8" width="16" height="16" fill="#E8788A" rx="2"/><rect x="18" y="24" width="24" height="20" fill="#7ECFB3" rx="2"/><rect x="8" y="28" width="12" height="10" fill="#B8A9E8" rx="2"/><rect x="22" y="44" width="8" height="14" fill="#FFB088" rx="1"/><rect x="32" y="44" width="8" height="14" fill="#FFB088" rx="1"/></svg>'">
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </section>

        <!-- ========== How It Works ========== -->
        <section class="section-how" id="how-it-works">
            <div class="section-header">
                <h2>How it works</h2>
            </div>

            <div class="steps-grid">
                <div class="step">
                    <div class="step-number">1</div>
                    <h3>Sign up in 2 minutes</h3>
                    <p>Create your account, tell us about your niche and active brand deals. No credit card needed.</p>
                </div>
                <div class="step">
                    <div class="step-number">2</div>
                    <h3>We organize your brand deals</h3>
                    <p>DealFlow pulls together your active collaborations into a single calm dashboard with status tracking.</p>
                </div>
                <div class="step">
                    <div class="step-number">3</div>
                    <h3>You create, we handle the rest</h3>
                    <p>Payment reminders, deadline nudges, status updates — all on autopilot while you focus on content.</p>
                </div>
            </div>
        </section>

        <!-- ========== Waitlist Form ========== -->
        <section class="section-waitlist" id="waitlist">
            <div class="orb" style="width: 300px; height: 300px; top: -60px; left: -80px; background: rgba(232,120,138,0.2);"></div>

            <div class="waitlist-card glass-elevated">
                <h2>Get early access</h2>
                <p class="subtitle">Join the waitlist and be first to try DealFlow. No spam, just updates.</p>

                <form action="https://formspree.io/f/xpwzgkvl" method="POST" class="waitlist-form" id="waitlist-form">
                    <input type="hidden" name="_subject" value="DealFlow Waitlist Signup">
                    <input
                        type="email"
                        name="email"
                        required
                        placeholder="your@email.com"
                        class="waitlist-input"
                        autocomplete="email"
                    >
                    <select name="role" class="waitlist-select">
                        <option value="" disabled selected>I am a...</option>
                        <option value="content-creator">Content creator</option>
                        <option value="micro-influencer">Micro-influencer (5K–50K followers)</option>
                        <option value="mid-influencer">Mid-tier creator (50K+ followers)</option>
                        <option value="brand">Brand / Agency</option>
                        <option value="other">Other</option>
                    </select>
                    <button type="submit" class="btn-primary waitlist-submit">Get early access</button>
                    <p class="waitlist-note">No spam. Unsubscribe anytime.</p>
                </form>

                <div class="waitlist-success" id="waitlist-success">
                    <div class="success-check">
                        <svg width="32" height="32" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24" stroke-width="2">
                            <path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" d="M5 13l4 4L19 7"/>
                        </svg>
                    </div>
                    <h3 style="font-family: var(--font-headline); font-size: 1.5rem; margin-bottom: 0.5rem;">You're on the list!</h3>
                    <p style="color: var(--text-secondary);">We'll reach out when DealFlow is ready for you.</p>
                </div>
            </div>
        </section>

    </main>

    <!-- ========== Footer ========== -->
    <footer class="footer">
        <div class="footer-inner">
            <div class="logo" style="gap: 0.5rem;">
                <div style="width: 24px; height: 24px; background: var(--accent); border-radius: 6px; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center;">
                    <svg width="14" height="14" fill="none" stroke="#fff" viewBox="0 0 24 24" stroke-width="2.5">
                        <path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" d="M13 7h8m0 0v8m0-8l-8 8-4-4-6 6"/>
                    </svg>
                </div>
                <span style="font-family: var(--font-headline); font-size: 1rem; color: var(--text-primary);">DealFlow</span>
            </div>
            <p class="footer-copy">© 2026 DealFlow. Built for creators, not accountants.</p>
        </div>
    </footer>

    <!-- ========== JavaScript ========== -->
    <script>
        // --- Theme ---
        function getStoredTheme() {
            try { return localStorage.getItem('df-theme'); } catch { return null; }
        }
        function setTheme(theme) {
            document.documentElement.setAttribute('data-theme', theme);
            try { localStorage.setItem('df-theme', theme); } catch {}
        }
        function toggleTheme() {
            const current = document.documentElement.getAttribute('data-theme');
            setTheme(current === 'dark' ? 'light' : 'dark');
        }
        // Init: respect stored preference, else system, else light (default)
        (function() {
            const stored = getStoredTheme();
            if (stored) { setTheme(stored); return; }
            if (window.matchMedia && window.matchMedia('(prefers-color-scheme: dark)').matches) {
                setTheme('dark');
            }
            // else default is light (set in HTML)
        })();

        // Keyboard support for theme toggle
        document.querySelector('.theme-toggle').addEventListener('keydown', function(e) {
            if (e.key === 'Enter' || e.key === ' ') {
                e.preventDefault();
                toggleTheme();
            }
        });

        // --- Smooth scroll for anchor links ---
        document.querySelectorAll('a[href^="#"]').forEach(link => {
            link.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
                const target = document.querySelector(this.getAttribute('href'));
                if (target) {
                    e.preventDefault();
                    target.scrollIntoView({ behavior: 'smooth', block: 'start' });
                }
            });
        });

        // --- Waitlist form ---
        const form = document.getElementById('waitlist-form');
        const successEl = document.getElementById('waitlist-success');
        form.addEventListener('submit', async function(e) {
            e.preventDefault();
            const data = new FormData(form);
            try {
                const res = await fetch(form.action, {
                    method: 'POST',
                    body: data,
                    headers: { 'Accept': 'application/json' }
                });
                if (res.ok) {
                    form.style.display = 'none';
                    successEl.classList.add('visible');
                }
            } catch {
                // Fallback: native submit
                form.submit();
            }
        });
    </script>

</body>
</html>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en" data-theme="light">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>DealFlow — Built for creators, not accountants</title>
    <meta name="description" content="DealFlow organizes every brand deal and nudges you only when it matters — so you stay in your flow.">
    <link rel="preconnect" href="https://fonts.googleapis.com">
    <link rel="preconnect" href="https://fonts.gstatic.com" crossorigin>
    <link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=DM+Serif+Display&family=Inter:wght@300..800&family=Press+Start+2P&display=swap" rel="stylesheet">
    <style>
        /* ===== Reset ===== */
        *, *::before, *::after { margin: 0; padding: 0; box-sizing: border-box; }

        /* ===== CSS Custom Properties ===== */
        :root {
            --font-headline: 'DM Serif Display', Georgia, serif;
            --font-body: 'Inter', system-ui, sans-serif;
            --font-pixel: 'Press Start 2P', monospace;

            /* Light theme (default) */
            --bg: #FFF5F7;
            --surface: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.7);
            --surface-solid: #FFFFFF;
            --accent: #E8788A;
            --accent-hover: #D4556A;
            --accent-rgb: 232, 120, 138;
            --mint: #7ECFB3;
            --lavender: #B8A9E8;
            --peach: #FFB088;
            --sky: #8AC4F4;
            --text-primary: #2D1F2D;
            --text-secondary: #7A6B7A;
            --border: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.06);
            --glass-bg: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.55);
            --glass-blur: 20px;
            --glass-border: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.06);
            --glass-shadow: 0 4px 24px rgba(45, 31, 45, 0.06);
            --glass-elevated-blur: 28px;
            --glass-elevated-shadow: 0 8px 40px rgba(45, 31, 45, 0.08), 0 0 60px rgba(232, 120, 138, 0.06);
            --nav-bg: rgba(255, 245, 247, 0.7);
            --input-bg: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8);
            --pixel-dot: #E8788A;
        }

        [data-theme="dark"] {
            --bg: #1A1118;
            --surface: rgba(30, 20, 28, 0.7);
            --surface-solid: #241C22;
            --accent: #E8788A;
            --accent-hover: #F09DAA;
            --accent-rgb: 232, 120, 138;
            --text-primary: #F5EEF2;
            --text-secondary: #A89BA6;
            --border: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.08);
            --glass-bg: rgba(30, 20, 28, 0.55);
            --glass-border: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.08);
            --glass-shadow: 0 4px 24px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
            --glass-elevated-shadow: 0 8px 40px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3), 0 0 60px rgba(232, 120, 138, 0.08);
            --nav-bg: rgba(26, 17, 24, 0.75);
            --input-bg: rgba(36, 28, 34, 0.8);
        }

        /* ===== Base ===== */
        body {
            font-family: var(--font-body);
            background: var(--bg);
            color: var(--text-primary);
            line-height: 1.6;
            transition: background 0.35s ease, color 0.35s ease;
            overflow-x: hidden;
        }

        h1, h2, h3 { font-family: var(--font-headline); font-weight: 400; }

        a { text-decoration: none; color: inherit; }

        img { max-width: 100%; height: auto; }

        /* ===== Glassmorphism ===== */
        .glass {
            background: var(--glass-bg);
            backdrop-filter: blur(var(--glass-blur));
            -webkit-backdrop-filter: blur(var(--glass-blur));
            border: 1px solid var(--glass-border);
            box-shadow: var(--glass-shadow);
        }

        .glass-elevated {
            background: var(--glass-bg);
            backdrop-filter: blur(var(--glass-elevated-blur));
            -webkit-backdrop-filter: blur(var(--glass-elevated-blur));
            border: 1px solid var(--glass-border);
            box-shadow: var(--glass-elevated-shadow);
        }

        /* ===== Buttons ===== */
        .btn-primary {
            display: inline-flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            gap: 0.5rem;
            padding: 1rem 2rem;
            background: var(--accent);
            color: #fff;
            font-family: var(--font-body);
            font-weight: 600;
            font-size: 1rem;
            border: none;
            border-radius: 1rem;
            cursor: pointer;
            transition: all 0.2s ease;
        }
        .btn-primary:hover {
            background: var(--accent-hover);
            transform: translateY(-1px);
            box-shadow: 0 8px 30px rgba(var(--accent-rgb), 0.3);
        }

        .btn-ghost {
            display: inline-flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            gap: 0.5rem;
            padding: 1rem 2rem;
            background: transparent;
            color: var(--accent);
            font-family: var(--font-body);
            font-weight: 600;
            font-size: 1rem;
            border: 2px solid var(--accent);
            border-radius: 1rem;
            cursor: pointer;
            transition: all 0.2s ease;
        }
        .btn-ghost:hover {
            background: rgba(var(--accent-rgb), 0.08);
            transform: translateY(-1px);
        }

        /* ===== Navbar ===== */
        .navbar {
            position: fixed;
            top: 0;
            left: 0;
            right: 0;
            z-index: 100;
            background: var(--nav-bg);
            backdrop-filter: blur(20px);
            -webkit-backdrop-filter: blur(20px);
            border-bottom: 1px solid var(--glass-border);
            padding: 0.875rem 1.5rem;
        }
        .navbar-inner {
            max-width: 1200px;
            margin: 0 auto;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: space-between;
        }
        .logo {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 0.625rem;
        }
        .logo-icon {
            width: 36px;
            height: 36px;
            background: var(--accent);
            border-radius: 10px;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
        }
        .logo-name {
            font-family: var(--font-headline);
            font-size: 1.375rem;
            color: var(--text-primary);
        }
        .navbar-actions {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 1rem;
        }
        .nav-cta {
            padding: 0.625rem 1.25rem;
            background: var(--accent);
            color: #fff;
            font-weight: 600;
            font-size: 0.875rem;
            border-radius: 0.75rem;
            border: none;
            cursor: pointer;
            transition: all 0.2s;
        }
        .nav-cta:hover { background: var(--accent-hover); }

        /* Theme toggle */
        .theme-toggle {
            width: 44px;
            height: 26px;
            border-radius: 13px;
            background: rgba(var(--accent-rgb), 0.15);
            border: 1px solid rgba(var(--accent-rgb), 0.25);
            position: relative;
            cursor: pointer;
            transition: background 0.3s;
            flex-shrink: 0;
        }
        .theme-toggle::after {
            content: '';
            position: absolute;
            width: 20px;
            height: 20px;
            border-radius: 50%;
            background: var(--accent);
            top: 2px;
            left: 2px;
            transition: transform 0.3s;
            box-shadow: 0 1px 4px rgba(0,0,0,0.15);
        }
        [data-theme="dark"] .theme-toggle::after {
            transform: translateX(18px);
        }
        .theme-icon {
            position: absolute;
            top: 50%;
            transform: translateY(-50%);
            font-size: 12px;
            line-height: 1;
            pointer-events: none;
        }
        .theme-icon--sun { left: 5px; }
        .theme-icon--moon { right: 5px; }
        [data-theme="light"] .theme-icon--moon { opacity: 0.3; }
        [data-theme="dark"] .theme-icon--sun { opacity: 0.3; }

        /* ===== Hero ===== */
        .hero {
            padding: 8rem 1.5rem 4rem;
            max-width: 1200px;
            margin: 0 auto;
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr;
            gap: 4rem;
            align-items: center;
            min-height: 90vh;
            position: relative;
        }
        .hero-left { position: relative; z-index: 2; }
        .hero-right { position: relative; z-index: 2; }

        .hero-badge {
            display: inline-block;
            font-family: var(--font-pixel);
            font-size: 9px;
            color: var(--accent);
            background: rgba(var(--accent-rgb), 0.1);
            border: 1px solid rgba(var(--accent-rgb), 0.2);
            padding: 0.5rem 1rem;
            border-radius: 0.5rem;
            margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
            line-height: 1.6;
        }

        .hero h1 {
            font-size: clamp(2.5rem, 5vw, 3.5rem);
            line-height: 1.15;
            margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
            color: var(--text-primary);
        }
        .hero h1 em {
            color: var(--accent);
            font-style: normal;
        }

        .hero-subhead {
            font-size: 1.125rem;
            color: var(--text-secondary);
            line-height: 1.7;
            margin-bottom: 2rem;
            max-width: 520px;
        }

        .hero-ctas {
            display: flex;
            gap: 1rem;
            flex-wrap: wrap;
            margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
        }

        .hero-trust {
            font-size: 0.875rem;
            color: var(--text-secondary);
        }

        /* Hero card */
        .hero-card {
            border-radius: 1.25rem;
            padding: 1.75rem;
            position: relative;
        }
        .hero-card-title {
            font-family: var(--font-body);
            font-size: 0.75rem;
            font-weight: 600;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            letter-spacing: 0.08em;
            color: var(--text-secondary);
            margin-bottom: 1.25rem;
        }
        .deal-row {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: space-between;
            padding: 0.875rem 1rem;
            background: var(--surface);
            border: 1px solid var(--glass-border);
            border-radius: 0.75rem;
            margin-bottom: 0.625rem;
        }
        .deal-row:last-child { margin-bottom: 0; }
        .deal-left {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 0.75rem;
        }
        .deal-avatar {
            width: 36px;
            height: 36px;
            border-radius: 0.625rem;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            font-size: 0.75rem;
            font-weight: 700;
            color: #fff;
        }
        .deal-info-name {
            font-size: 0.9rem;
            font-weight: 600;
            color: var(--text-primary);
        }
        .deal-status {
            font-family: var(--font-pixel);
            font-size: 7px;
            padding: 0.375rem 0.75rem;
            border-radius: 0.375rem;
            line-height: 1;
        }
        .status-mint { background: rgba(126, 207, 179, 0.15); color: var(--mint); }
        .status-peach { background: rgba(255, 176, 136, 0.15); color: var(--peach); }
        .status-lavender { background: rgba(184, 169, 232, 0.15); color: var(--lavender); }
        .status-sky { background: rgba(138, 196, 244, 0.15); color: var(--sky); }
        .hero-card-footer {
            margin-top: 1.25rem;
            padding-top: 1rem;
            border-top: 1px solid var(--glass-border);
            font-size: 0.8rem;
            color: var(--text-secondary);
            text-align: center;
        }

        /* Pixel art character placeholder */
        .pixel-character {
            position: absolute;
            image-rendering: pixelated;
            pointer-events: none;
            z-index: 3;
        }
        .pixel-character img {
            image-rendering: pixelated;
            width: 100%;
            height: auto;
        }
        .hero .pixel-character {
            width: 140px;
            bottom: -30px;
            right: -40px;
        }

        /* Decorative orbs */
        .orb {
            position: absolute;
            border-radius: 50%;
            filter: blur(80px);
            opacity: 0.25;
            pointer-events: none;
            z-index: 0;
        }
        [data-theme="dark"] .orb { opacity: 0.12; }

        /* ===== Problem Section ===== */
        .section-problem {
            padding: 5rem 1.5rem;
            max-width: 1200px;
            margin: 0 auto;
            position: relative;
        }
        .section-header {
            text-align: center;
            margin-bottom: 3rem;
        }
        .section-header h2 {
            font-size: clamp(2rem, 4vw, 2.75rem);
            color: var(--text-primary);
            margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
        }
        .section-header p {
            color: var(--text-secondary);
            font-size: 1.125rem;
        }

        .problem-grid {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(3, 1fr);
            gap: 1.5rem;
            position: relative;
            z-index: 2;
        }
        .problem-card {
            border-radius: 1.25rem;
            padding: 2rem;
            text-align: center;
            transition: transform 0.2s ease;
        }
        .problem-card:hover { transform: translateY(-4px); }
        .problem-stat {
            font-family: var(--font-headline);
            font-size: 3rem;
            color: var(--accent);
            margin-bottom: 0.75rem;
        }
        .problem-text {
            font-size: 0.95rem;
            color: var(--text-secondary);
            line-height: 1.6;
        }

        /* ===== Features Section ===== */
        .section-features {
            padding: 5rem 1.5rem;
            max-width: 1200px;
            margin: 0 auto;
            position: relative;
        }
        .features-grid {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr);
            gap: 1.5rem;
            position: relative;
            z-index: 2;
        }
        .feature-card {
            border-radius: 1.25rem;
            padding: 2.5rem;
            transition: transform 0.2s ease;
        }
        .feature-card:hover { transform: translateY(-4px); }
        .feature-icon {
            width: 56px;
            height: 56px;
            border-radius: 1rem;
            background: rgba(var(--accent-rgb), 0.1);
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            margin-bottom: 1.25rem;
        }
        .feature-card h3 {
            font-size: 1.375rem;
            margin-bottom: 0.75rem;
            color: var(--text-primary);
        }
        .feature-card p {
            font-size: 1rem;
            color: var(--text-secondary);
            line-height: 1.7;
        }

        /* ===== How It Works ===== */
        .section-how {
            padding: 5rem 1.5rem;
            max-width: 1200px;
            margin: 0 auto;
        }
        .steps-grid {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(3, 1fr);
            gap: 2rem;
        }
        .step {
            text-align: center;
        }
        .step-number {
            width: 56px;
            height: 56px;
            margin: 0 auto 1.25rem;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            border-radius: 1rem;
            font-family: var(--font-pixel);
            font-size: 16px;
            color: var(--accent);
            background: rgba(var(--accent-rgb), 0.1);
            border: 2px solid rgba(var(--accent-rgb), 0.2);
            /* pixel dotted border effect */
            box-shadow:
                -2px -2px 0 0 rgba(var(--accent-rgb), 0.15),
                2px -2px 0 0 rgba(var(--accent-rgb), 0.15),
                -2px 2px 0 0 rgba(var(--accent-rgb), 0.15),
                2px 2px 0 0 rgba(var(--accent-rgb), 0.15);
        }
        .step h3 {
            font-size: 1.25rem;
            margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
            color: var(--text-primary);
        }
        .step p {
            font-size: 0.95rem;
            color: var(--text-secondary);
            line-height: 1.6;
        }

        /* ===== Waitlist Section ===== */
        .section-waitlist {
            padding: 5rem 1.5rem;
            max-width: 600px;
            margin: 0 auto;
            position: relative;
        }
        .waitlist-card {
            border-radius: 1.5rem;
            padding: 3rem;
            text-align: center;
            position: relative;
            z-index: 2;
        }
        .waitlist-card h2 {
            font-size: 2.25rem;
            margin-bottom: 0.75rem;
            color: var(--text-primary);
        }
        .waitlist-card .subtitle {
            color: var(--text-secondary);
            font-size: 1rem;
            margin-bottom: 2rem;
        }
        .waitlist-form { display: flex; flex-direction: column; gap: 1rem; }
        .waitlist-input {
            width: 100%;
            padding: 1rem 1.25rem;
            border-radius: 0.875rem;
            border: 1px solid var(--glass-border);
            background: var(--input-bg);
            color: var(--text-primary);
            font-family: var(--font-body);
            font-size: 1rem;
            outline: none;
            transition: border-color 0.2s, box-shadow 0.2s;
        }
        .waitlist-input::placeholder { color: var(--text-secondary); opacity: 0.6; }
        .waitlist-input:focus {
            border-color: var(--accent);
            box-shadow: 0 0 0 3px rgba(var(--accent-rgb), 0.12);
        }
        .waitlist-select {
            width: 100%;
            padding: 1rem 1.25rem;
            border-radius: 0.875rem;
            border: 1px solid var(--glass-border);
            background: var(--input-bg);
            color: var(--text-primary);
            font-family: var(--font-body);
            font-size: 1rem;
            outline: none;
            appearance: none;
            cursor: pointer;
            transition: border-color 0.2s, box-shadow 0.2s;
        }
        .waitlist-select:focus {
            border-color: var(--accent);
            box-shadow: 0 0 0 3px rgba(var(--accent-rgb), 0.12);
        }
        .waitlist-submit {
            width: 100%;
            padding: 1rem;
            font-size: 1.125rem;
        }
        .waitlist-note {
            font-size: 0.8rem;
            color: var(--text-secondary);
            margin-top: 0.5rem;
        }
        .waitlist-success {
            display: none;
            padding: 2rem 0;
        }
        .waitlist-success.visible { display: block; }
        .success-check {
            width: 64px;
            height: 64px;
            border-radius: 50%;
            background: rgba(var(--accent-rgb), 0.1);
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            margin: 0 auto 1rem;
        }
        .success-check svg { color: var(--accent); }

        /* ===== Footer ===== */
        .footer {
            padding: 2rem 1.5rem;
            border-top: 1px solid var(--glass-border);
            text-align: center;
        }
        .footer-inner {
            max-width: 1200px;
            margin: 0 auto;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: space-between;
        }
        .footer-copy {
            font-size: 0.8rem;
            color: var(--text-secondary);
        }

        /* ===== Pixel Corner Decorations ===== */
        .pixel-corner {
            position: absolute;
            width: 24px;
            height: 24px;
            opacity: 0.3;
            pointer-events: none;
        }
        .pixel-corner--tl { top: 8px; left: 8px; }
        .pixel-corner--tr { top: 8px; right: 8px; transform: scaleX(-1); }
        .pixel-corner--bl { bottom: 8px; left: 8px; transform: scaleY(-1); }
        .pixel-corner--br { bottom: 8px; right: 8px; transform: scale(-1); }
        .pixel-corner svg { width: 100%; height: 100%; }

        /* ===== Reduced Motion ===== */
        @media (prefers-reduced-motion: reduce) {
            *, *::before, *::after {
                animation-duration: 0.01ms !important;
                transition-duration: 0.01ms !important;
            }
        }

        /* ===== Responsive ===== */
        @media (max-width: 1024px) {
            .hero {
                grid-template-columns: 1fr;
                gap: 3rem;
                padding-top: 7rem;
                min-height: auto;
            }
            .hero-right { order: -1; }
            .hero .pixel-character { display: none; }
            .features-grid { grid-template-columns: 1fr; }
        }

        @media (max-width: 768px) {
            .problem-grid { grid-template-columns: 1fr; }
            .steps-grid { grid-template-columns: 1fr; gap: 2.5rem; }
            .hero h1 { font-size: 2.25rem; }
            .hero-badge { font-size: 8px; }
            .waitlist-card { padding: 2rem 1.5rem; }
            .footer-inner { flex-direction: column; gap: 0.75rem; }
            .nav-cta-desktop { display: none; }
        }

        @media (max-width: 375px) {
            .hero { padding-top: 6rem; padding-left: 1rem; padding-right: 1rem; }
            .hero-ctas { flex-direction: column; }
            .section-problem,
            .section-features,
            .section-how,
            .section-waitlist { padding-left: 1rem; padding-right: 1rem; }
        }
    </style>
</head>
<body>

    <!-- ========== Navbar ========== -->
    <nav class="navbar">
        <div class="navbar-inner">
            <div class="logo">
                <div class="logo-icon">
                    <svg width="20" height="20" fill="none" stroke="#fff" viewBox="0 0 24 24" stroke-width="2.5">
                        <path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" d="M13 7h8m0 0v8m0-8l-8 8-4-4-6 6"/>
                    </svg>
                </div>
                <span class="logo-name">DealFlow</span>
            </div>
            <div class="navbar-actions">
                <div class="theme-toggle" onclick="toggleTheme()" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-label="Toggle light/dark theme">
                    <span class="theme-icon theme-icon--sun">☀️</span>
                    <span class="theme-icon theme-icon--moon">🌙</span>
                </div>
                <a href="#waitlist" class="nav-cta nav-cta-desktop">Get early access</a>
            </div>
        </div>
    </nav>

    <main>

        <!-- ========== Hero ========== -->
        <section class="hero">
            <!-- Decorative orbs -->
            <div class="orb" style="width: 400px; height: 400px; top: -80px; left: -100px; background: rgba(232,120,138,0.35);"></div>
            <div class="orb" style="width: 300px; height: 300px; bottom: -60px; right: -60px; background: rgba(184,169,232,0.3);"></div>

            <div class="hero-left">
                <div class="hero-badge">The business side of being a creator, handled</div>
                <h1>Built for <em>creators,</em> not accountants.</h1>
                <p class="hero-subhead">
                    Brands love your content. But the invoices, follow-ups, and payment tracking? Not exactly your vibe.
                    DealFlow organizes every brand deal and nudges you only when it matters — so you stay in your flow.
                </p>
                <div class="hero-ctas">
                    <a href="#waitlist" class="btn-primary">Get early access</a>
                    <a href="#how-it-works" class="btn-ghost">See how it works</a>
                </div>
                <p class="hero-trust">Built by creators, for creators.</p>
            </div>

            <div class="hero-right">
                <div class="hero-card glass-elevated" style="position: relative;">
                    <!-- Pixel corner decorations -->
                    <div class="pixel-corner pixel-corner--tl">
                        <svg viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="var(--accent)" opacity="0.4">
                            <rect x="0" y="0" width="4" height="4"/><rect x="4" y="0" width="4" height="4"/><rect x="8" y="0" width="4" height="4"/>
                            <rect x="0" y="4" width="4" height="4"/><rect x="0" y="8" width="4" height="4"/>
                        </svg>
                    </div>
                    <div class="pixel-corner pixel-corner--br">
                        <svg viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="var(--accent)" opacity="0.4">
                            <rect x="0" y="0" width="4" height="4"/><rect x="4" y="0" width="4" height="4"/><rect x="8" y="0" width="4" height="4"/>
                            <rect x="0" y="4" width="4" height="4"/><rect x="0" y="8" width="4" height="4"/>
                        </svg>
                    </div>

                    <p class="hero-card-title">Your brand deals, organized</p>

                    <div class="deal-row">
                        <div class="deal-left">
                            <div class="deal-avatar" style="background: var(--mint);">FC</div>
                            <span class="deal-info-name">FashionCo</span>
                        </div>
                        <span class="deal-status status-mint">Content delivered</span>
                    </div>
                    <div class="deal-row">
                        <div class="deal-left">
                            <div class="deal-avatar" style="background: var(--peach);">TB</div>
                            <span class="deal-info-name">TechBrand</span>
                        </div>
                        <span class="deal-status status-peach">Waiting for payment</span>
                    </div>
                    <div class="deal-row">
                        <div class="deal-left">
                            <div class="deal-avatar" style="background: var(--lavender);">SB</div>
                            <span class="deal-info-name">SnackBox</span>
                        </div>
                        <span class="deal-status status-lavender">Briefing received</span>
                    </div>
                    <div class="deal-row">
                        <div class="deal-left">
                            <div class="deal-avatar" style="background: var(--sky);">FG</div>
                            <span class="deal-info-name">FitGear</span>
                        </div>
                        <span class="deal-status status-sky">Shooting next week</span>
                    </div>

                    <p class="hero-card-footer">Always up to date — DealFlow handles the tracking</p>

                    <!-- Pixel art character placeholder: creator filming -->
                    <div class="pixel-character" style="width: 120px; bottom: -30px; right: -50px;">
                        <img src="img/hero-creator.png" alt="Pixel art creator filming with phone" width="120" height="120"
                             onerror="this.parentElement.innerHTML='<svg viewBox="0 0 64 64" width="120" height="120" style="image-rendering:pixelated"><rect x="24" y="8" width="16" height="16" fill="#E8788A" rx="2"/><rect x="20" y="24" width="24" height="20" fill="#B8A9E8" rx="2"/><rect x="44" y="26" width="12" height="8" fill="#7A6B7A" rx="1"/><rect x="24" y="44" width="8" height="14" fill="#FFB088" rx="1"/><rect x="32" y="44" width="8" height="14" fill="#FFB088" rx="1"/></svg>'">
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </section>

        <!-- ========== Problem Section ========== -->
        <section class="section-problem">
            <div class="orb" style="width: 350px; height: 350px; bottom: -100px; right: -80px; background: rgba(126,207,179,0.25);"></div>

            <div class="section-header">
                <h2>Sound familiar?</h2>
            </div>

            <div class="problem-grid">
                <div class="problem-card glass">
                    <div class="problem-stat">68%</div>

                </div>
                <div class="problem-card glass">
                    <div class="problem-stat">1 in 3</div>
                    <p class="problem-text">brand deals has payment issues creators never follow up on</p>

                <div class="problem-card glass">

                    <p class="problem-text">brand conversations the average creator juggles at once</p>
